lines.text: Oh, huh... I guess I should've taken a closer look at this guy before.
I mean, I got a decent look when I showed up, but it doesn't hurt to have an evidence card for the guy.
Poor guy. All he wanted to do was rob people at gunpoint!
(Guess I can kick this guy as much as I want, now...)
Well, I moved this guy’s coat over a little, and it looks like there’s some kinda hole in him.
I mean, it’s tiny, and the flesh is all gross and charred around it, so I’m not sure, but…
You think maybe <c=#FF00FF>Slick Emmup got shot?</c>
Well, let’s not jump to conclusions…
But keep that in mind. Maybe it’ll be useful information.
